extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    (CLST102 and CLST103) or CLST129 or CLST200 or CLST207 or CLST101, or permission of the Department.

basic.description: Intensive study of the achievements in architecture, painting and sculpture, and town planning from 480 B.C. to 31 B.C.
basic.subject: CLST
basic.title: Archaeology of the Classical World and Hellenistic Period
